name: Inevitable (wanicdigipen)
description:
INEVITABLE

An endless runner in the hellscape of a child's nightmare. Flee from a horrifying monster, avoid deadly obstacles, and do everything you can to put off the inevitable.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Press space to jump, D to air-dash, and S to slam towards the ground.

CREDITS:

Higgins: Director

Eukaria H: Producer

Liam B: Tech Lead

Zeke L: Art Lead

James K: Sound Lead
